Posts.Content: Jan 11, 2011 10:50AM wrightgirl wrote: try eating yogurt.  It has natural bactria in it that helps.  I had slight case of thrush after 1st round of chemo and  started eating yogurt right away - it went away, so i eat it every time and has not come back. My mom had ashma and got thush from inhalers and was told to use yogurt - it worked so that is why I tried it. Easy solution so try it to see if it helps.  good luck
Posts.Title: Stubborn Thrush on tongue Carrol2 wrightgirl
